verses.verse: When <S%H3588><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> shall bring <S%H935><s%> thee into <S%H413><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> whither <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> thou <S%H859><s%> goest <S%H935><s%> to possess <S%H3423><s%> it, and hath cast out <S%H5394><s%> many <S%H7227><s%> nations <S%H1471><s%> before <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> thee, the Hittites, <S%H2850><s%> and the Girgashites, <S%H1622><s%> and the Amorites, <S%H567><s%> and the Canaanites, <S%H3669><s%> and the Perizzites, <S%H6522><s%> and the Hivites, <S%H2340><s%> and the Jebusites, <S%H2983><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> nations <S%H1471><s%> greater <S%H7227><s%> and mightier <S%H6099><s%> than <S%H4480><s%> thou;

And when the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> shall deliver <S%H5414><s%> them before <S%H6440><s%> thee; thou shalt smite <S%H5221><s%> them, and utterly destroy <S%H2763><s%> <S%H2763><s%> them; thou shalt make <S%H3772><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> covenant <S%H1285><s%> with them, nor <S%H3808><s%> show mercy <S%H2603><s%> unto them:

Neither <S%H3808><s%> shalt thou make marriages <S%H2859><s%> with them; thy daughter <S%H1323><s%> thou shalt not <S%H3808><s%> give <S%H5414><s%> unto his son, <S%H1121><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> his daughter <S%H1323><s%> shalt thou take <S%H3947><s%> unto thy son. <S%H1121><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> they will turn away <S%H5493><s%> <S%H853><s%> thy son <S%H1121><s%> from following <S%H4480><s%> <S%H310><s%> me, that they may serve <S%H5647><s%> other <S%H312><s%> gods: <S%H430><s%> so will the anger <S%H639><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> be kindled <S%H2734><s%> against you, and destroy <S%H8045><s%> thee suddenly. <S%H4118><s%>

But <S%H3588><s%> <S%H518><s%> thus <S%H3541><s%> shall ye deal <S%H6213><s%> with them; ye shall destroy <S%H5422><s%> their altars, <S%H4196><s%> and break down <S%H7665><s%> their images, <S%H4676><s%> and cut down <S%H1438><s%> their groves, <S%H842><s%> and burn <S%H8313><s%> their graven images <S%H6456><s%> with fire. <S%H784><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> thou <S%H859><s%> art a holy <S%H6918><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> unto the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God: <S%H430><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> hath chosen <S%H977><s%> thee to be <S%H1961><s%> a special <S%H5459><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> unto himself, above all <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3605><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> that <S%H834><s%> are upon <S%H5921><s%> the face <S%H6440><s%> of the earth. <S%H127><s%>

The LORD <S%H3068><s%> did not <S%H3808><s%> set his love <S%H2836><s%> upon you, nor choose <S%H977><s%> you, because ye were more in number <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7230><s%> than any <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3605><s%> people; <S%H5971><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> ye <S%H859><s%> were the fewest <S%H4592><s%> of all <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3605><s%> people: <S%H5971><s%>

But <S%H3588><s%> because the LORD <S%H3068><s%> loved <S%H4480><s%> <S%H160><s%> you, and because he would keep <S%H4480><s%> <S%H8104><s%> <S%H853><s%> the oath <S%H7621><s%> which <S%H834><s%> he had sworn <S%H7650><s%> unto your fathers, <S%H1><s%> hath the LORD <S%H3068><s%> brought you out <S%H3318><s%> <S%H853><s%> with a mighty <S%H2389><s%> hand, <S%H3027><s%> and redeemed <S%H6299><s%> you out of the house <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1004><s%> of bondmen, <S%H5650><s%> from the hand <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3027><s%> of Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>

Know <S%H3045><s%> therefore that <S%H3588><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God, <S%H430><s%> he <S%H1931><s%> is God, <S%H430><s%> the faithful <S%H539><s%> God, <S%H410><s%> which keepeth <S%H8104><s%> covenant <S%H1285><s%> and mercy <S%H2617><s%> with them that love <S%H157><s%> him and keep <S%H8104><s%> his commandments <S%H4687><s%> to a thousand <S%H505><s%> generations; <S%H1755><s%>

And repayeth <S%H7999><s%> them that hate <S%H8130><s%> him to <S%H413><s%> their face, <S%H6440><s%> to destroy <S%H6><s%> them: he will not <S%H3808><s%> be slack <S%H309><s%> to him that hateth <S%H8130><s%> him, he will repay <S%H7999><s%> him to <S%H413><s%> his face. <S%H6440><s%>

Thou shalt therefore keep <S%H8104><s%> <S%H853><s%> the commandments, <S%H4687><s%> and the statutes, <S%H2706><s%> and the judgments, <S%H4941><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I <S%H595><s%> command <S%H6680><s%> thee this day, <S%H3117><s%> to do <S%H6213><s%> them.

Wherefore it shall come to pass, <S%H1961><s%> if <S%H6118><s%> ye hearken <S%H8085><s%> <S%H853><s%> to these <S%H428><s%> judgments, <S%H4941><s%> and keep, <S%H8104><s%> and do <S%H6213><s%> them, that the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> shall keep <S%H8104><s%> unto thee <S%H853><s%> the covenant <S%H1285><s%> and the mercy <S%H2617><s%> which <S%H834><s%> he swore <S%H7650><s%> unto thy fathers: <S%H1><s%>

And he will love <S%H157><s%> thee, and bless <S%H1288><s%> thee, and multiply <S%H7235><s%> thee: he will also bless <S%H1288><s%> the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of thy womb, <S%H990><s%> and the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of thy land, <S%H127><s%> thy corn, <S%H1715><s%> and thy wine, <S%H8492><s%> and thine oil, <S%H3323><s%> the increase <S%H7698><s%> of thy kine, <S%H504><s%> and the flocks <S%H6251><s%> of thy sheep, <S%H6629><s%> in <S%H5921><s%> the land <S%H127><s%> which <S%H834><s%> he swore <S%H7650><s%> unto thy fathers <S%H1><s%> to give <S%H5414><s%> thee.

Thou shalt be <S%H1961><s%> blessed <S%H1288><s%> above all <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3605><s%> people: <S%H5971><s%> there shall not <S%H3808><s%> be <S%H1961><s%> male <S%H6135><s%> or female barren <S%H6135><s%> among you, or among your cattle. <S%H929><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> will take away <S%H5493><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> thee all <S%H3605><s%> sickness, <S%H2483><s%> and will put <S%H7760><s%> none <S%H3605><s%> <S%H3808><s%> of the evil <S%H7451><s%> diseases <S%H4064><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> which <S%H834><s%> thou knowest, <S%H3045><s%> upon thee; but will lay <S%H5414><s%> them upon all <S%H3605><s%> them that hate <S%H130><s%> thee.

And thou shalt consume <S%H398><s%> <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> shall deliver <S%H5414><s%> thee; thine eye <S%H5869><s%> shall have no pity <S%H2347><s%> <S%H3808><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> them: neither <S%H3808><s%> shalt thou serve <S%H5647><s%> <S%H853><s%> their gods; <S%H430><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> that <S%H1931><s%> will be a snare <S%H4170><s%> unto thee.

If <S%H3588><s%> thou shalt say <S%H559><s%> in thine heart, <S%H3824><s%> These <S%H428><s%> nations <S%H1471><s%> are more <S%H7227><s%> than <S%H4480><s%> I; how <S%H349><s%> can <S%H3201><s%> I dispossess <S%H3423><s%> them?

Thou shalt not <S%H3808><s%> be afraid <S%H3372><s%> of <S%H4480><s%> them: but shalt well remember <S%H2142><s%> <S%H2142><s%> <S%H853><s%> what <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> unto Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> and unto all <S%H3605><s%> Egypt; <S%H4714><s%>

The great <S%H1419><s%> temptations <S%H4531><s%> which <S%H834><s%> thine eyes <S%H5869><s%> saw, <S%H7200><s%> and the signs, <S%H226><s%> and the wonders, <S%H4159><s%> and the mighty <S%H2389><s%> hand, <S%H3027><s%> and the stretched out <S%H5186><s%> arm, <S%H2220><s%> whereby <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> brought thee out: <S%H3318><s%> so <S%H3651><s%> shall the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> do <S%H6213><s%> unto all <S%H3605><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> of whom <S%H834><s%> thou <S%H859><s%> art afraid. <S%H3372><s%> <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%>

Moreover <S%H1571><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> will send <S%H7971><s%> <S%H853><s%> the hornet <S%H6880><s%> among them, until <S%H5704><s%> they that are left, <S%H7604><s%> and hide themselves <S%H5641><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> thee, be destroyed. <S%H6><s%>

Thou shalt not <S%H3808><s%> be frightened <S%H6206><s%> at <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> them: for <S%H3588><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> is among <S%H7130><s%> you, a mighty <S%H1419><s%> God <S%H410><s%> and terrible. <S%H3372><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> will put out <S%H5394><s%> <S%H853><s%> those <S%H411><s%> nations <S%H1471><s%> before <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> thee by little <S%H4592><s%> and little: <S%H4592><s%> thou mayest <S%H3201><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> consume <S%H3615><s%> them at once, <S%H4118><s%> lest <S%H6435><s%> the beasts <S%H2416><s%> of the field <S%H7704><s%> increase <S%H7235><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> thee.

But the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> shall deliver <S%H5414><s%> them unto <S%H6440><s%> thee, and shall destroy <S%H1949><s%> them with a mighty <S%H1419><s%> destruction, <S%H4103><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> they be destroyed. <S%H8045><s%>

And he shall deliver <S%H5414><s%> their kings <S%H4428><s%> into thine hand, <S%H3027><s%> and thou shalt destroy <S%H6><s%> <S%H853><s%> their name <S%H8034><s%> from under <S%H4480><s%> <S%H8478><s%> heaven: <S%H8064><s%> there shall no <S%H3808><s%> man <S%H376><s%> be able to stand <S%H3320><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> thee, until <S%H5704><s%> thou have destroyed <S%H8045><s%> them.

The graven images <S%H6456><s%> of their gods <S%H430><s%> shall ye burn <S%H8313><s%> with fire: <S%H784><s%> thou shalt not <S%H3808><s%> desire <S%H2530><s%> the silver <S%H3701><s%> or gold <S%H2091><s%> that is on <S%H5921><s%> them, nor take <S%H3947><s%> it unto thee, lest <S%H6435><s%> thou be snared <S%H3369><s%> therein: for <S%H3588><s%> it <S%H1931><s%> is an abomination <S%H8441><s%> to the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God. <S%H430><s%>

Neither <S%H3808><s%> shalt thou bring <S%H935><s%> an abomination <S%H8441><s%> into <S%H413><s%> thine house, <S%H1004><s%> lest thou be <S%H1961><s%> a cursed thing <S%H2764><s%> like it: <S%H3644><s%> but thou shalt utterly detest <S%H8262><s%> <S%H8262><s%> it, and thou shalt utterly abhor <S%H8581><s%> <S%H8581><s%> it; for <S%H3588><s%> it <S%H1931><s%> is a cursed thing. <S%H2764><s%>
